notes: Appears with [[The Hunger]] and with the [[World Devourer]] in the [[Heart of Destruction Quest]].
name: Greed
strategy:
Greed appears in the room with [[The Hunger]] and [[World Devourer]]. They seem to be immune to all damage, so focus on your battle with [[The Hunger]] and try to stay diagonal of them when possible.
Alternatively, you can lure The Hunger through the teleport in the middle of the room, then walk the Greed over it to make it disappear.
In the room with [[World Devourer]], it is highly recommended to lure the [[World Devourer]] over the teleport in the middle and then let the Greed walk over it so they disappear. Otherwise, your team will be swarmed with Greeds.
